description: A pun on "háo wú rén xìng" (毫无人性 - utterly inhumane). "Háo" here replaces "háo" (utterly) with "háo" (tuhao/richtycoon). It implies someone is so rich it's insane or annoying.

examples.chinese: 明星在北京买了什么大豪宅呢,简直壕无人性
examples.translation: The star bought such a huge mansion in Beijing, they are simply filthy rich.

examples.chinese: 迪拜大富翁真的太壕无人性了
examples.translation: Dubai tycoons are truly obscenely rich.

examples.chinese: 壕无人性！皇家马德里本赛季6亿欧元引援
examples.translation: Filthy rich! Real Madrid spent 600 million Euros on transfers this season.
